text: Learning to program, is python right for me?
I thought I'd start learning a real programming language from scratch.
I can manage to code in C++, but I haven't been brushing up on my C++ skills at all.
Is it the right language for me?
I'm just being an enthusiastic kid, and I'm not learning for any strict purpose (rather than just programming for the heck of it ;)
One more question on the sly, does python support OOP?
Should I start using a thirdparty IDE straightaway or shall I stick to IDLE?
